mapper.select: call rd_admin.sp_admin_service_center_notice_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_service_center_notice_add(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
